response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. This unique item holds significant value to me, but I am confident it will also bring immense value to you, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you.

Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it could have on your business or personal projects, I am extending an offer to sell it to you at a price that reflects its true worth and my desire to ensure it finds the right home where it can be appreciated fully. My proposed price for this remarkable product is $1,200,000.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your success.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
